tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE stock_data (
    stock_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(10),
    date DATE,
    open_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    close_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    high_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    low_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE stock_prices (
    stock_symbol STRING,
    date DATE,
    open_price DECIMAL,
    high_price DECIMAL,
    low_price DECIMAL,
    close_price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE historical_stock_prices (
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    open_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    close_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    high_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    low_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    volume INT NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (stock_symbol, date)
);

CREATE TABLE market_data (
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    market_index VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    open_index DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    close_index DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    high_index DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    low_index DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    volume INT NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (date, market_index)
);

CREATE TABLE machine_learning_models (
    model_id INT NOT NULL,
    model_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    accuracy DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (model_id)
);

CREATE TABLE stock_predictions (
    prediction_id INT NOT NULL,
    model_id INT NOT NULL,
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    prediction_date DATE NOT NULL,
    predicted_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (prediction_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES machine_learning_models(model_id)
);

CREATE TABLE historical_stock_prices (
    symbol VARCHAR(10),
    date DATE,
    open_price DECIMAL(10,2),
    close_price DECIMAL(10,2),
    high_price DECIMAL(10,2),
    low_price DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE market_data (
    date DATE,
    market_index VARCHAR(50),
    index_value DECIMAL(12,4),
    volume INT
)

CREATE TABLE stock_predictions (
    symbol VARCHAR(10),
    prediction_date DATE,
    predicted_price DECIMAL(10,2),
    actual_price DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE model_performance (
    model_name VARCHAR(50),
    training_date DATE,
    accuracy DECIMAL(5,2),
    loss DECIMAL(5,2)
)

CREATE TABLE trade_history (
    trade_id INT,
    trade_date DATE,
    symbol VARCHAR(10),
    action VARCHAR(10),
    quantity INT,
    price DECIMAL(10,2)
)
